栰字的基本解释

栰
fá
同“筏”。

栰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fá］
［《廣韻》房越切，入月，奉。］
(1)渡水用的竹排或木排。
(2)乘筏渡水。

栰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栰； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页523第19
【唐韻】房越切，音伐。與筏同。【爾雅·釋地疏】桴栰，編木爲之，大曰栰，小曰桴，乗之渡水。【類篇】海中大船。【魏書·李崇傳】有火栰。

栰字的源字形

栰字的起名意思

暂无。

栰
fá

栰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fá］
["Guangyun" the room is more cut, into the moon, bong. ]
(1) Bamboo rafts or wooden rafts for crossing water.
(2) Take a raft to cross the water.
栰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栰; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 523 Page 19
[Tang Yun] The more the room is cut, the sound is cut. Same as the raft. 【Erya·Shidishu】The 桴栰 is made up of wood, the big is called 栰, the small is called 桴, and the water is crossed by the ride. 【Classes】A big ship in the sea. [Wei Shu·Li Chong Biography] There is a fire.
